definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: A cube is a regular solid.
Using the knowledge of abstract algebra, the rotation groups of the regular polyhedron are determined.
sentences.chinese: 通過抽象代數知識，求出所有正多面體的旋轉羣。
